title: BOC user wants to update a UR Waiver Request before sending Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club or BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waiver Request Entry widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the user submits a UR Waiver request
BUT user does not send the Request Bulletin
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to edit the following fields:
   Wishes to play in a foreign league checkbox (and corresponding Country dropdown)
   Cash Consideration Amount
   Comments
BUT user should NOT be able to edit Type and "As per release [date] [time]"

title: BOC user wants to update a UR Waiver Request after sending Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged 
AND a UR Waiver request has already been submitted 
AND the Request Bulletin corresponding to this UR Waiver Request has already been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Request Entry Screen
custom_expected:
THEN none of the following fields should be editable:
   Wishes to play in a foreign league checkbox (and corresponding Country dropdown)
   Cash Consideration Amount
   Comments
   Type and "As per release [date] [time]"

title: BOC user wants to edit the day's requests - Specific Org is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND edit button is displayed on the form 
AND a specific Org is selected from the dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks the Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN form should be reloaded in edit mode
AND save button should become available
AND no fields in the "Players with Requested Waivers" table should be editable
BUT Claim Period Expires field and "Request Bulletin Comments" textfield should be editable
AND  "Request Entry" section of the form should also be expandable and editable
AND "Add Player" button should be available
AND if no request has been entered for that Org for that day clicking "Edit", then there should be a blank Request Entry in the "Request Entry" section of the form
AND "Latest Transaction" field should always be shown to BOC and should be editable (within the Request Entry section)
AND The available fields and styling should follow the data discovery and the wireframe

title: BOC user wants to edit the day's requests - "All" is selected from Org dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND edit button is displayed on the form 
AND a "All" is selected from the Org dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks the Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN form should be reloaded in edit mode
AND save button should become available
AND no fields in the "Players with Requested Waivers" table should be editable
BUT Claim Period Expires field and "Request Bulletin Comments" textfield should be editable
AND "Add Player" button should not be visible or should be disabled 
AND The available fields and styling should follow the data discovery and the wireframe

title: BOC user wants to save edits to the day's requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen on the transactions dashboard
AND user is viewing the day's requests on the widget in Edit mode
AND Save button is available on the form 
BUT "Submit" button is NOT available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN the system should run a required field and formatting check, as well as all "On Submit" rules for any newly entered players
AND if a new request has been entered for an Org which did not previously have a submitted request, then the "Submitted By" and "Submitted On" fields for that request should be populated
BUT if that Org had at least one prior request for this bulletin then the Submitted information should not be updated
AND once all required fields and rules have passed, the form should reload in View mode, with "Request Entry" section collapsed and "Players with Requested Waivers" section expanded

title: User wants to edit the day's requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request
AND current time is before 2 pm on the desired Request Entry Date
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Request screen in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN "Edit" button should be visible (not visible after 2PM)
AND Clicking "Edit" should open one Request Entry Form

title: User wants to submit a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to the "Waivers" screen from the left nav
AND page is open in edit mode
AND "Submit to BOC" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND if any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user should receive an error message
AND system should refresh the page and sort the players alphabetically
AND system should check for any On Submit rules violations 
AND system should show successful waiver request submission notification and "Submitted On" and "Submitted By" fields are populated
AND these fields should be  updated if request submitted subsequent times
AND system should go back to view mode when complete

title: User wants to see any transaction on the player within the prior 30 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player that has a tx in his history during the last 30 days
custom_expected:
THEN tx and date should be displayed
AND only latest tx and only latest non-paperwork tx should be shown
BUT if no tx is found the label and field should not display

title: BOC User wants to delete a UR waiver request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND a UR waiver request has been submitted for a player
AND user has navigated to request entry section of waivers screen
AND trash can icon is visible on the request form for BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected:
THEN UR request should be removed
AND if the user clicks save after removing the request the Release from Roster (URREL) tx should be reversed
AND all appropriate On Reverse updates should be made
AND "Voided" should beadded to the player's history entry
AND Player's roster status should be returned to its previous value

title: User does NOT want to receive error submitting UR waivers for player on DL without indicating he has recovered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC or Club user
AND current date and request date are during the current season
AND user has navigated to waivers screen 
AND user is attempting to submit a waiver request
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a player 
AND user selects UR as type
custom_expected:
THEN "Player has recovered from ailment and is capable of playing at his accustomed level" checkbox should NOT display
AND when user submits request error message #31 should NOT display
BUT if user selects non-UR waivers (OR) then the checkbox should display
AND if user selects non-UR waivers and attempts to submit without the checkbox checked, error message #31 should display

title: User wants to request waivers for players on inactive list
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to submit waiver requests
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to player dropdown in request entry section of waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN Players with the following MJ Roster Statuses should appear in the player dropdown so that waivers may be requested for them:
Military Leave
Disqualified
Restricted
Ineligible
Suspended
Bereavement/Family Medical
Paternity Leave
Strike
Voluntary Retired

title: User wants to receive error if they request waivers for player on Inactive List
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to submit waiver requests
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a player with one of the following roster statuses:
Military Leave
Disqualified
Restricted
Ineligible
Suspended
Bereavement/Family Medical
Paternity Leave
Strike
Voluntary Retired
AND clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the [Inactive List Type] list and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested.”
AND clicking back should return user to the form
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if Waiver System dates don't exist for the year of the waiver request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request
AND one or more of the following fields does not have valid date values in the Waivers section of the System Admin> System Dates tab:
-DE Closed Period
-First, Second, Third and Fourth Waiver Periods for Optional Assignment Waivers
-First, Second, Third, Fourth, and Fifth Waiver Periods for Outright Assignment Waivers
-Trade Waiver Request Period for Trade Assignment Waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers tab
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Waiver Request(s) cannot be submitted because one or more waiver dates are missing for [Waiver Type]. 
Please enter these dates and retry.”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form

title: User wants to receive error/warning if player has DL status and request date is before reinstatement date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver request 
AND the player has a current or pending MJ DL status of:
• 7 Day Concussion DL
• Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL
• 15 Day DL
• Rehab 15 Day DL
• 60 Day DL
• Rehab 60 Day DL
AND request date on the form is before earliest reinstatement date from the player's most recent DL placement or transfer
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the DL, and has not yet served his minimum period of inactivity. He may have waivers requested on him starting [DL Reinstatement Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error/warning if player has DL status and request date is before reinstatement date - Optioned Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver request for an optioned player
AND the player has a MN League DL Status of:
• 7 Day DL
• Rehab 7 Day DL
• 60 Day DL
• Rehab 60 Day DL
AND request date on the form is before earliest reinstatement date from the player's most recent DL placement or transfer
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the DL, and has not yet served his minimum period of inactivity. He may have waivers requested on him starting [DL Reinstatement Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if injury checkbox is checked and one of two Injury Status buttons are not selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND Injury checkbox on the form is checked
BUT one of the two Injury Status buttons are not selected
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a blocker message (error message #32)
AND BOC should be able to override the blocker

title: User wants to see Release Information appended to Comments when they submit UR Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND the request is a UR Waiver Request
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN The text “As Per Release on [release date] at [release hour]:[release minute][AM/PM][timezone]” should be appended to the Comments

title: User wants to see Release Information appended to Comments when they submit UR Waiver Request - Foreign League
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND the request is a UR Waiver Request
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox is checked
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN The text “As Per Release on [release date] at [release hour]:[release minute][AM/PM][timezone]” should be appended to the Comments
AND the text “Player wishes to play in [country].” should be appended to the Comments
AND the foreign league text should be appended after the  As Per release text

title: User wants to receive error when submitting Waiver Request for a 10/5 player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player is a 10/5 player  (Player Profile field "10/5 Player" is Yes) 
AND user has selected an Irrevocable, non-UR waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit on the Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is a 10/5 player, and may not have Irrevocable waivers requested for him.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if Trade waivers are submitted outside of Trade Waiver Request Period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player 
AND user has selected Trade Waivers
AND the date falls outside of Trade Waiver Request Period as specified in the System Dates widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request for [Last Name], [First Name]. Trade Waivers may only be requested between [Trade Waiver Request Period Start Date] and [Trade Waiver Request Period End Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: BOC user wants to request waivers for Voluntarily Retired Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user 
AND user has navigated to Waiver Request Entry screen in edit mode
AND user has selected an Org from the dropdown
AND a player from that Org has a status of "Voluntarily Retired" 
BUT player has not had this status for more than 2 years from current date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks on the Player Dropdown in Request Entry section
custom_expected:
THEN the voluntarily retired player should show up in Players Dropdown for the selected Org (For BOC only)
BUT club users should not be able to select these players or see them in their player dropdown
AND if a UR is submitted for a Voluntarily Retired player, the Release from Roster transaction should still be created as for any other player

title: User wants to receive error when submitting request for player with Full or Limited No-Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request Entry for a player
AND selected player has a Full or Limited No-Trade Provision in their current MJC
AND user has selected an Irrevocable Waiver type (other than UR waivers, UR should not generate error)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit to BOC or Save
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate error “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has a no trade or limited no trade covenant in his contract, and may not have Irrevocable waivers requested for him.”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if player has non-UR type waivers requested during the DE Closed Period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player is Rule 5 Draft Selected or Draft Excluded
AND player has non-UR type waivers requested
AND using year from the Player's profile (i.e. Draft Excluded YYYY), current date falls within DE Closed Period specified in the System Dates widget (Note that the date range spans calendar years)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] was either selected in the Rule 5 draft or has a Draft Excluded status and waivers may not be requested until [Eligible Date?].”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if Non-UR waivers are selected and player's pending MJ status is Bereavement List or Voluntary Retired
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user selects Non-UR waivers
AND selected player's pending or actual MJ roster status is Bereavement List or Voluntarily Retired
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the [Inactive List Type] list and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if "Player has recovered" checkbox has not been checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND "Player has recovered" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a blocker message (error message #31)
AND BOC should be able to override the error

title: User wants to receive error if UR waivers are selected and player's pending MJ status is Deceased, Disqualified, Ineligible, Military Leave, Restricted, or Suspended
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user selects UR Waivers
AND selected player's pending or actual MJ roster status is Deceased, Disqualified, Ineligible, Military Leave, Restricted, or Suspended
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the [Inactive List Type] list and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if it is after 2:00 PM ET on Request Date when request is submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND current time is after 2:00 PM ET on the Date of the Request
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request for [Last Name], [First Name]. New requests may not be submitted after 2:00 PM on the request date.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: Release from Roster tx automatically created for Unconditional Release Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND the request is a UR Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the UR Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN user should be alerted with message "The Release from Roster transaction for <Lastname, Firstname> has been changed to Approved state successfully"
AND Effective Date should be set from the "As Per Release on" date
AND Player's player history should be updated with: Code = URREL Description = Release from Roster, From Org/Club To Org/Club fields to be in black font, To Org/Club fields blank
AND automatically created "As per Release...." comment from waiver request should be saved in the tx
AND player's MJ Roster status should be set to "Released from Roster"
AND system should ensure that a 2nd transaction is not created if set of requests are submitted a 2nd time with UR included

title: User wants to receive warning if there are any players with Irrevocable Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND Waiver Request has Irrevocable Waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker error 	
“You have requested Irrevocable Waivers on the following players:
 
List of players with Irrevocable Waivers (Last, First)
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request

title: User wants to receive error if UR waivers are selected and Release Date is later than current Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected UR waivers
AND Release Date is later than current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker error “Invalid Date entered for [Last Name], [First Name]’s Release, cannot be after the Current Date.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form

title: User wants to receive error when submitting a player that has been signed as Free Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and viewing Waivers Screen in edit mode
AND user has selected a Request Date that that is prior to June 16
AND user has selected a player that has been signed as a Free Agent under Article XXB in the prior offseason
AND user has selected Outright Waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message “Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is a recently signed XXB Free Agent.  The waiver cannot be requested for the selected player until [June 16, Current Year].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if OR waivers are selected and player already secured OR waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected a player that has already secured outright waivers
AND "Outright Waivers Good Until" date on the Player's Profile is later than the Secure Date on the new Request (2 waiver business days after request date)
AND user has selected "OR" waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. You have already secured Outright Waivers for [Last Name], [First Name]. Secured waivers will be effective until [Waiver Expiration Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if TRD waivers are selected and player already secured TRD waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in and attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user has selected a player that has already secured trade waivers
AND "Trade Waivers Good Until" date on the Player's Profile is later than the Secure Date on the new Request (2 waiver business days after request date)
AND user has selected "TRD" waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request. You have already secured Trade Assignment Waivers for [Last Name], [First Name]. Secured waivers will be effective until [Waiver Expiration Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if non-UR is selected and player has withdrawn requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player that has one or more withdrawn waiver requests in the past 30 calendar days
AND user has selected non-UR Waiver Type
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has had waivers withdrawn within 30 days.”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if player has unexpired Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player
AND selected player has an unexpired submitted or approved Optional or Trade waiver request
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has an unexpired Trade or Optional Assignment waiver request.”
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with waiver request submission (BOC Only)

title: User wants to be able to enter additional fields for a player who wishes to play in foreign league when UR waivers is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_steps: WHEN UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_expected:
THEN "As per release on" field should be displayed with a date picker and time picker
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox should display
AND when “Wishes to play in a foreign league” is checked, a dropdown should appear with a list of available countries that include Japan, Mexico and South Korea
AND a “Cash Consideration Amount” field should be displayed that allows entry of a dollar amount

title: User wants to see "Player is on Optional Assignment" appended to Comments when Optioned player is selected
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player whose current MJ roster status is Optioned
custom_expected: THEN "Player is on Optional Assignment" should be appended to the Comments

title: User wants to see any transaction on the player within the prior 30 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player that has a tx in his history during the last 30 days
custom_expected:
THEN tx and date should be displayed
AND only latest tx and only latest non-paperwork tx should be shown
BUT if no tx is found the label and field should not display

title: User wants to be shown that they have selected Irrevocable waivers on a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects an "Irrevocable" waiver (Outright and UR by default)
custom_expected: THEN "IRREVOCABLE" should display next to Type field

title: User wants to be unable to select a player if player already has a pending waiver request for the selected date (cannot select a player twice)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player already has a pending request
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Player"
AND opens "Player" Dropdown
custom_expected: THEN player should not be listed in the dropdown

title: User wants to designate that player on DL has recovered
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN Request Date is during the season
AND the player is on the DL (This includes both Major League DL and Optioned players on the Minor Lg DL. this includes players on rehab as well)
custom_expected: THEN the user should see “Player has recovered from ailment and is capable of playing at his accustomed level.” checkbox

title: User wants to know if player already had waiver request withdrawn during current waiver period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to the request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player that has already had a waiver request withdrawn during the current waiver period for the same Org
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses TRD or OPT as Waiver Type
custom_expected: THEN "Irrevocable" should be displayed in orange, next to the "Type" label

title: User wants to see "Waivers" as a tab on Transactions Dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Transactions" exists as an option in the left nav on the home screen
AND "Waivers" appears as a tab on the Transactions dashboard
AND user is logged in with permissions to view Waivers tab
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Waivers"
custom_expected:
THEN 3 accordions shouuld be displayed on the page
AND details should match wireframes and data discovery

title: BOC User wants to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view "Waivers" tab
AND "Waivers" is an option on the left nav
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Waivers" tab
custom_expected:
THEN for each request system should display Player Name, Position, MLS, DL (Y/N), DE/Sel (Y/N), Waiver Type, Latest Transaction and date (if one exists in last 30 days), Comments and, for BOC, Request Date, Org and Submitted On date, and Submitted By (username)
AND the layout of the tx should match View mode of provided wireframe
AND fields should match data discovery

title: User wants to select a player to submit a Waiver Request for
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing the "Waivers" tab
AND select2 dropdown to select a player is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks select2 player dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to choose from a list of players from the selected club, who are eligible to have waivers requested
AND eligible players should only include 40-man roster players and any 60 Day DL/60 Day DL Rehab players

title: Club User wants to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN "Request Date" should be defaulted to today's date if before 2:00PM
BUT "Request Date" should be defaulted to next Waiver Request Date (next business day) if after 2:00PM
AND if tx is occuring during the Weekend Waiver period as specified in System Dates widget, weekends should be included as business days
AND any requests for the default date and the user's Org should be shown
AND system should display Player Name, Position, MLS, DL (Y/N), DE/Sel (Y/N), Waiver Type, Latest Transaction and date (if one exists in last 30 days), Comments and, for BOC,  Request Date, Org and Submitted On date, and Submitted By (username)
AND layout and fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to select a date for a Waiver Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to date picker field on Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN date picker should default to today's date until 2:00 PM
BUT after 2:00 PM date picker should default to tomorrow's date
AND system should load appropriate requests for the default date shown and user's Org for club user and selected Org for BOC user
AND system should allow any historical date entry
BUT system should  prevent user from selecting date beyond the default date
AND if different date is selected appropriate requests for that date and Org should be loaded

title: User wants to add multiple players to Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Request screen
AND the screen is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to click "Add Player" to request waivers on additional players
AND user should be able to request waivers on up to a maximum of 7 players
AND after 7 requests have been made the button should no longer be available

title: User wants to see an "Injured" checkbox if Waiver Request is made in the off season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND request date is not between the MJ league "First Day of Season" and "Last Day of Season" system dates
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player
custom_expected: THEN an "Injured" checkbox should be displayed

title: BOC User wants to edit comments in Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN BOC user should always see Comments field
AND BOC user should be able to enter/edit comments in the Comments field

title: Club User wants to edit comments in Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN club user should only see comments field if populated 
AND user should not be able to edit comments

title: User wants to see 2 Injury Status radio button choices when they check the "Injured" checkbox in the off season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user checks "Injured" checkbox
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to choose one of three injury status radio buttons listed:
     "Player may be unable to play but his contract may be assigned consistent with the Basic Agreement"
     "Player has recovered from ailment and is capable of playing at his accustomed level"
AND none of the two injury status radio buttons should be selected by default, the user should be forced to make a selection
AND "Type of Surgery" text box should be displayed

title: User wants to be shown that they have selected Irrevocable waivers on a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit Waiver Requests
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a waiver that is irrevocable (Outright and UR by default)
custom_expected: THEN "IRREVOCABLE" should display next to Type field

title: User wants to remove a Waiver Request before the submission deadline
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Waiver Request screen in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a trash can should be available for each individual player except for UR waivers that have already been submitted 
AND clicking this trash can should remove the individual request entry
AND user should be able to delete non-UR requests even after submission if still before submission deadline

title: User wants to see weekend waiver periods on system dates screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club or BOC user
AND user has permissions to edit System Dates screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to System Dates Screen
custom_expected:
THEN "Allow Weekend Waiver Requests" should be an available field
AND user should be able to enter or pick a start date and end date

title: User wants to cancel any edits to Request Entry
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club or BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waiver Request Entry screen
AND and user is attempting to edit a Waiver Request
AND "Cancel" button is available on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel" while editing the request
custom_expected:
THEN system should display message  "Are you sure you want to Cancel? You will lose any unsaved changes."
AND "Yes" and "No" options should be available 
AND clicking 'Yes' should remove any changes since the last "submit" and reload the form in view mode, maintaining the selected org and date
AND clicking 'No' should close the modal and allow the user to continue working.

title: User wants errors to be handled on request entry using standard/global format
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC or club user
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request Entry 
AND required fields are missing from the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN global error modal should be displayed
AND when user clicks "Back" to close the error modal, errors should be pinned to the browser and the missed required fields should be highlighted in red

title: User wants to see Claim Expiration and Withdrawal Expiration dates on Request Entry screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC user
AND has navigated to the Waivers tab on the Transactions dashboard
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the waivers screen
AND user selects a Request Date
custom_expected:
THEN Claim Period Expires [Date] - [Time] and Withdrawal Period Expires [Date] - [Time] should also be displayed
AND "Claim Period Expires" should be 2 waiver business days after the request date
AND "Withdrawal Period Expires" should be 2 waiver business days after the claiming period expiration date

title: User wants to see comments if selected player is a 10/5 player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request Entry
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a 10/5 player (greater than 10 years total MLS with at least the last 5 years at the same club - found in Service section of the Player Profile)
custom_expected: THEN the text "10/5 Player" should be appended to the Comments

title: User wants to see Player's name in Request Entry section stand out more
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in and viewing waivers screen in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player from the 'Player' dropdown in request entry section
custom_expected:
THEN the label "Player" should be removed from the request entry box
AND placeholder text "Select a Player" should be added to the searchable select and vertically centered
AND Once the Player has been selected their name should appear in blue text, font-size: 16px, font-weight:600
AND the Player's name should link to the Player profile

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - BOC - Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with BOC admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN BOC admin user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view, create, delete, edit, and submit waiver requests for players

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - BOC - Basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with BOC basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN BOC basic user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all waiver requests 
BUT user should NOT be able to make any changes

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - Club - Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Club Admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view, create, delete, submit, and edit all waiver requests for their own players (It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the request)

title: Submit a Waiver Request Permissions - Club - Basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Club Basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with a Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to view all waiver requests for their own players (It does not matter if the BOC or the club initiated the request)
BUT user should not be able to make any changes

title: User does not want to see seconds in time field for UR Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC user
AND user has navigated to Waivers Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player and chooses "UR" type waivers
custom_expected:
THEN seconds should not be available in the "As Per Release AT" field timepicker
AND seconds should not display in this field in view or edit mode

title: BOC user wants to send a Request Bulletin
User wants to see the most up to date "latest transaction"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to create a Waiver Request Entry
custom_steps: WHEN user loads a pending waiver request bulletin (not yet sent)
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for and display the players' latest Approved transaction, even if none was previously displayed or it differs from what was displayed when request was submitted
AND if a user has manually entered a latest transaction for the player, that should NOT be overwritten by any transaction information found by the system. The user's entry should remain
AND refreshing the page should load the latest transactions for the player(s) being viewed
AND when BOC hits "Send Request Bulletin" system should NOT check for the latest transactions, and should capture whatever current entry is and store it along with bulletin information
AND once Bulletin has been sent, system should no longer look for or update any of the list players' Latest Transaction information, but should display whatever value was stored there at the time of the bulletin being sent for the first time (to account for subsequent re-sends of the same bulletin)

title: User wants to receive notification when a request bulletin is sent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC or Club user 
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND one or more players are found in the "Players with Submitted Requests" table
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a Notification for users with the roles "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-VIEWERS", "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-EDITORS", or "EBIS-WV-BULLETIN-SENDERS"
AND notification Date should be equal to the current date, with the To and From Org columns blank
AND description text should read "Waiver request bulletin for [request date] is available."

title: User wants to receive clipboard notification that there are no waiver requests when Request Bulletin is sent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC or Club user
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND there are currently no players listed in the "Players with Submitted Requests" table for the selected request date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a Notification for users with the roles "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-VIEWERS", "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-EDITORS", or "EBIS-WV-BULLETIN-SENDERS"
AND notification Date should be equal to the current date, with the To and From Org columns blank
AND description text should read "No Waiver Requests for [request date]."
AND description should not be a hyperlink

title: BOC user wants to resend notifications for a Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen on transactions dashboard
AND user is viewing a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
AND "Resend Notification Emails" button has appeared on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Resend Notification Emails" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a pop-up where the user will be able to select the type of notification emails to resend, and the Org(s) it should be resent to
AND "All BOC" should be checked by default
AND "All Clubs" should be selected by default
AND Selecting "Select Clubs" should result in a Club dropdown appearing
AND When "Select Clubs" is actively selected, the "Club" dropdown should be a multi-select dropdown with all 30 Orgs' abbreviations available
AND if the user re-selects "All Clubs" the Club dropdown should be hidden again, and any previous selections made should be ignored
AND the "Bulletin" field should be a dropdown with the options "Request" and "Results" (but for now the only option is "Request")
AND clicking "Cancel" should close the pop-up and send nothing
AND clicking "Resend" should NOT store any changes made to the form or update the stored bulletin, but should generate a new set of notifications for the selected recipients

title: Club user wants to see Players with Requested Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN a "Players with Requested Waivers" collapsible section should be displayed and expanded by default
AND this section should NOT be visible to Clubs prior to the Bulletin being sent
AND "Players with Requested Waivers" section should match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND "Players with Requested Waivers" section should contain all of the players for whom waivers were requested by all Orgs for the currently selected Request Date
AND the table should be sorted by Org and then by the player's name (Last, First)
AND the "Request Entry" section should be collapsed by default
AND expanding "Request Entry" should display the players that the Club has requested waivers on for the "Request Date" being viewed
AND if no players are found in the Request Entry section, there should be a line of text stating "No Waiver Requests Found"

title: Club user wants to submit a Waiver Claim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Waiver claim
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN A "Claim" button should be displayed for each player submitted by another Org
BUT no claim  button should display for players from the user's Org
AND no claim button should appear for any club user if after 1:00PM ET on the Claim Expiration Date
AND clicking "Claim" should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to claim waivers on the selected player
AND if user clicks “OK” the system should submit the claim for the club and in place of "claim" button, system should display date and time for which claim was made
BUT if user clicks “Cancel” claim should not be made on player and user should be taken back to claim entry screen
AND once a Waiver Claim has successfully been submitted for a player, the claim information should appear in the "Results" table for the BOC as "Claimed by ORG mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am/pm"

title: BOC User wants to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN a Claim button should be displayed for all players if 'All' is chosen in Org dropdown
BUT if user chooses a specific Org, the Claim button should not appear for players from that Org
AND clicking the Claim button should launch a pop-over that allows the user to select a single Org
AND the player's Org should not appear in the dropdown, nor should any other Orgs that have already submitted a waiver claim for the player
AND clicking “Cancel” should close the popover and take no action
AND selecting an Org and clicking "Claim" should  prompt the user to confirm the claim
AND once user has confirmed they wish to proceed with the claim, modal and popover should be dismissed and user should be returned to "Players with Submitted Requests" table
AND the Claim button should remain for the player
AND if BOC user were to expand the "Results" section of form at this time, they would see "Claimed by ORG date/time" information just as though a Club had performed the Claim
AND if BOC user has entered a Claim on behalf of a club and it is after 1:00PM on the Claim Expiration Date, result should show Claim Expiration Date as mm/dd/yyyy in the result and 12:59 pm as the time in the result

title: User wants to receive error if submitting a Waiver Claim past 1PM EST on Waiver Claim Expiration Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim
AND current time is past 1PM EST on the Claim Expiration Date of the current Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN user confirms that they wish to proceed with the claim
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "The claiming period for [Last Name], [First Name]'s waiver request expired at 1:00 PM on [Claiming Period Expiration Date]”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: Club User wants to see only the Request Entry section on pending request dates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
AND user has navigated to the "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
AND BOC has not sent out a bulletin for the selected request date
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN user should only see the Request Entry section when viewing that request date
AND user should NOT see the Players with Pending waivers requests section if the bulletin has not been sent
AND once the bulletin is sent for that date, then Clubs should view both the Request Entry and Players with Requested Waivers sections when viewing that request date

title: User wants to view notification on clipboard when club has submitted waiver claim entry
custom_preconds: GIVEN a waiver request exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN club submits a waiver claim entry on the player
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a notification for BOC users in the roles "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-VIEWERS", "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-EDITORS", or "EBIS-WV-BULLETIN-SENDERS"
AND notification text should be in this format: "Waiver Request for [request date] – [claiming org] has placed a claim on this player"
AND the notification Date should be equal to the current date, with the Player name populated and a hyperlink to the player's history
AND description should be a link to the waivers screen for the relevant Request Date

title: BOC user wants to view submitted Waiver Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request and generate Request Bulletin
custom_steps: WHEN  BOC user first navigates to the waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN Request Date should default to the oldest pending (unsent) Request Bulletin
AND 'All' should be a choice in the Org dropdown and is the default selection 
AND selecting a single "Org" should refresh the page to display only the selected Org's players within the Players with Requested Waivers section
AND The only sections visible should be "Request Entry" and "Players with Requested Waivers"
AND "Request Entry" should be collapsed by default
AND "Players with Requested Waivers" should be expanded, and display all submitted requests, sorted alphabetically by Org and then Player Last Name, First Name
AND Player names in the Players with Requested Waivers table should be hyperlinks to the player's Player History
AND Displayed fields and layout should match the wireframe and data discovery

title: BOC user wants to expand Requests Entry while in Players with Requested Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to Players with Requested Waivers section of Waivers tab on transactions dashboard
AND form is in view or edit mode
AND user has selected "All" in the Org dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to expand the "Request Entry" section
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocking message "An Org must be selected to see Requests"
AND clicking back should return the user to the screen with Request Entry still collapsed

title: BOC user wants to navigate to the Request Entry for a single Org from Players with submitted Waiver Requests section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user 
AND user has navigated to Waiver Request Screen on Transactions Dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user views the  "Players with Requested Waivers" section of the form,
custom_expected:
THEN the "Org" column should display as a hyperlink
AND if Org filter is set to "All"then clicking on the "Org" column with a request listed should switch the filter from "All" to the selected Org, expand "Request Entry" portion of the screen and place the focus of the screen at the top of the "Request Entry" portion 
AND user should not be prompted to confirm that they know they will lose changes, if in edit mode
AND if Org filter is set to a specific org then clicking "Org" column hyperlink should take the user to the top of the "Request Entry" section with it expanded

title: BOC user wants to see "Send Request Bulletin" button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC user
AND user is attempting to send a Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_steps:
WHEN Current Date is ≥ Request date
AND current time is after 2PM EST on the Request Date
custom_expected:
THEN "Send Request Bulletin" button should be visible for BOC users in view and edit mode
BUT "Send Request Bulletin" button should only be enabled in view mode

title: User wants to sort Players with Requested Waivers section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC 
AND user has navigated to Players with Requested Waivers section of Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks any of the column headers in Players with Requested Waivers section
custom_expected:
THEN system should sort the waiver requests displayed in the table by the appropriate column
AND Table headers should be blue
AND Sorting on a column should add the gray background to the column and the red sort icon

title: BOC user wants to receive warning if there are any unsent request bulletins from 30 days prior
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is attempting to send a Waiver Request Bulletin
AND  there are one or more unsent request bulletins for the past 30 calendar days from the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for any unsent request bulletins for the past 30 calendar days from the current date
AND system should display warning message “Unsent waiver requests remain from [Pending Waiver Date(s)]”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form 
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with workflow (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive warning if they navigate away from the form in edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND has the Waivers form open in edit mode
AND user has selected a specific Org from the dropdown
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects another Org
OR user attempts to change the Request Date
OR user clicks out of the Waivers Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN a message should display stating "You have unsaved changes. Do you wish to continue? [OK/Cancel]"
AND clicking 'OK' should cancel the changes, collapse Request Entry, and return the user to Edit mode
AND clicking 'Cancel' should keep the changes and leave the user in the open Request Entry accordion

title: BOC user wants to receive an error when they send Waiver Request Bulletin if Claim Expiration Date is not later than Request Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC user
AND user is attempting to send a Waiver Request Bulletin 
AND entered "Claim Expiration Date" is on or before "Requested Date"
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Claim Expiration Date cannot be equal to or before the Request Date.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form

title: BOC User wants to view a properly formatted waiver result including Eligible Org after a waiver claim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a Waiver Claim has been processed
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Results" section of waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN if only one claim has been entered, it should appear as "Claimed by *ARI 6/10/2016 12:59 " showing Date and time of claim and claiming Org
AND if more than one Org has entered a claim for a player, this should appear as "Claimed by *ARI 6/10/2016 12:59 BAL 6/10/2016 12:59"
AND an asterisk (*) should be used to denote the Org actually eligible to make the claim
AND after eligible Org, following claim Orgs should be displayed in alphabetical order

title: BOC User wants system to determine which Org is eligible when a waiver request has more than one claim entered for it - Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC or Club user
AND a Trade Waiver Request has been entered for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the Trade Waiver Request has more than one claim entered for it
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if any of the claiming Orgs are in the same League as Org that entered the Request
AND if there is only one claiming Org in the same League, then that Org should be designated as the Eligible Org
BUT if more than one claiming Org is in the same League, the Orgs NOT in the same League should automatically not be eligible
AND if no Orgs are in the same League as the Org that entered the Request, or if more than one claiming Org is in the same League, then the Eligible Org should be decided based on the lowest winning percentage of the remaining Eligible Orgs
AND if the Claim Expiration Date is within the first 31 days of the season (First Day of MJ Season system date + 30 days), then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the prior season should be considered the Eligible Org
BUT if the Claim Expiration Date is NOT within the first 31 days of the season, then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the current season should be considered the Eligible Org
AND if there is more than one Org that has the lowest percentage, then the system should look to the prior season, and so on until the tie is broken

title: BOC User wants system to determine which Org is eligible when a waiver request has more than one claim entered for it - Non-Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC or Club user
AND a Non-Trade (OR, UR, OPT) Waiver Request has been entered for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the Trade Waiver Request has more than one claim entered for it
custom_expected:
THEN if the Claim Expiration Date is within the first 31 days of the season, then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the prior season should be considered the Eligible Org
BUT if the Claim Expiration Date is NOT within the first 31 days of the season, then the Org with the lowest winning percentage from the current season should be considered the Eligible Org
AND if there is more than one Org that has the lowest percentage, then the system should look to the prior season, and so on until the tie is broken

title: BOC User wants to cancel a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen on transactions dashboard
AND a Waiver request has been submitted for one or more players
AND "Cancel" button is displayed in the first column of the table for each player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel"
custom_expected:
THEN a confirmation message should be displayed confirming the cancellation on the player [“Are you sure you want to cancel the waiver for [Last Name], [First Name]?”]
AND when user confirms, System should change Waiver Result Status to Cancelled and display, "Cancelled on [current date] (mm/dd/yyyy)", in place of request result

title: BOC User wants to modify which Org is eligible when a waiver request has more than one claim entered for it
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the "Results" Section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard in edit mode 
AND more than one Org has claimed the same player 
AND "Update" button is visible in the "Results" column for that player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Update"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a popover (see wire) that allows the BOC user to select the "winning" Org
AND the dropdown available on the pop-over should only contain those Orgs that have claimed the player
AND once an Org is selected, the waiver Result should show with the "*" now in front of the selected Org

title: BOC User wants to view Waiver Claim results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC user
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND user has selected a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user has selects a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
custom_expected:
THEN the "Results" collapsible section should be available
AND this section should be open by default, with the remaining sections collapsed when the current date is equal to the Claim Period expiration date
AND the Results table should match the provided data discovery and wireframe
AND the Results Bulletin Comments text area should be available and visible per the wireframe
AND the checkbox "Automatically send this bulletin at 1:00 pm EST on the Claim Period Expiration Date" should be displayed and unchecked by default

title: BOC user wants to be able to choose which Waiver Bulletin to send
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing Waivers Screen
custom_steps:
When user has selects a Request Date for which a Request Bulletin has been sent 
AND current date is equal to or greater than Claim Expiration date of Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_expected:
THEN "Send Request Bulletin" should be replaced by the "Send Results Bulletin" split button
AND clicking the main blue button should work to send the Results Bulletin
BUT clicking the dropdown arrow should allow the user to choose to Resend the Request Bulletin instead
AND choosing to resend the Request Bulletin should work the same as the "Send Request Bulletin" button did prior to the switch to the split button

title: User wants to receive clipboard notification that Result bulletin is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with role:  "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-VIEWERS", "EBIS-WV-REQUEST-EDITORS", or "EBIS-WV-BULLETIN-SENDERS"
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user Clicks "Send Result Bulletin" on a submitted Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN user should receive a notification 
AND notification Date should be equal to the current date, with the To and From Org columns blank
AND description text should read "Waiver result bulletin for [request date] is available."

title: BOC user wants to resend notifications for Result Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the Waivers Request Entry Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a Request Date for which Request Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN "Resend Notification Emails" button should appear

title: User wants sending Waiver Results Bulletin to properly set results for players who have secured waivers - Claim Expiration Date

AND these requested waivers have NOT been claimed or cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN result text should be set to "Secured until {Waiver Claim Expiration Date}"
AND waiver expiration should default to 5PM on Waiver Period End date 
BUT if player is optioned, system should update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 3rd calendar day after claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period
AND for outright waivers where the claim expiration date was in the 1st, 2nd, or 5th outright waiver period, system should update waiver expiration date to 1pm on the 7th calendar day after the claim expiration date, unless that falls after the end of the waiver period
BUT for outright waivers with a claim expiration date in the 4th outright waiver period, if the player is not Optioned, set the time in the result message to Midnight instead of whatever time was determined above
AND Waiver Period End Date should be determined by Waiver Type (see business rules)

title: User wants to see a "ribbon" on top of Waivers screen

AND for bulletins displayed in the ribbon that have not yet had the results bulletin sent, the Request Date should be followed by "Claim Period Expires mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm ET" (time is always 1:00 PM ET)
AND for bulletins displayed in the ribbon that have already had the results bulletin sent, the Request Date should be followed by " Withdrawal Period Expires mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm ET" (time is always 1:30 PM ET)
AND the ribbon must display properly on screen resolutions down to 1024px wide

AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected

AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Req Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed

    -Bulletin: Fri 10/21/2022
    -Outright Claim period expires Tue 10/25/2022
    -Unconditional Release Claim period expires Mon 10/24/2022
  
AND Format of each request should be:
     -Type - Requesting Org
     -Player Last, Player First Middle Initial. - POS - MLS: 0.000
     -Last TX: (as displayed on bulletin in system)
AND Bottom of email should contain:  "ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin*"

-{Waiver Result}

title: As a User, I want the OR waiver claim priority to be updated to account for prior claims
custom_steps:
As per the new CBA OR waiver claim priority is now updated such that a club who has successfully claimed and been awarded a player since the prior spring training start date will drop to the end of the priority list for that player regardless of their winning percentage.  Calculation of winning percentage is unchanged.

If all teams with claims on a player have a prior claim in the timeframe then the club with the lowest winning pct is awarded the player.

AC

* Update the OR waiver claim priority to account for clubs with prior OR claims being dropped to the bottom of the list
* If all clubs who have placed a claim on a player have a prior existing claim then the club awarded the player is the one with the lowest winning pct
* The process will wrap around to the prior year come January 1st 2023 - it will look back to spring training 2022 for claims up until spring training 2023, at which point the process will reset



!image-20220314-195637.png|width=494,height=146!

title: As a User, I want the waiver priority for claims to be updated to remove the league preference
custom_steps:
As per the new CBA, waiver priority will no longer have a league preference, instead winning percentage will determine who wins on a claim.

Additional changes will be made to account for prior claims as well, covered with [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1216|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1216|smart-link] 

AC

* League is no longer used to determine waiver priority, instead winning pct is all that matters (lowest PCT is awarded the player)

title: As a User I want to remove the waiver period logic for secured OR waivers
custom_steps:
As per the new CBA all secured OR waivers will last for seven days from when they were secured and then expire.  There is no longer a â€˜waiver periodâ€™ for which securing waivers lasts for the entire period.

AC

* Secured waivers last for 7 days before expiring
* This happens whether or not the player is on option

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs limited to 7 Waiver Requests, per type, per bulletin
custom_steps:
Currently, the system prevents club users from entering more than 7 total waiver requests per bulletin.  This rule should be updated to account for waiver type.

AC:
 - Clubs will be allowed 7 UR Waiver Requests per bulletin
 - Clubs will be allowed 7 OR Waiver Requests per bulletin
 - Attempting to go over 7 will result in a blocking error for Club User, overrideable warning for BOC User

title: Full Regression of Waivers
As a BOC Admin, I want MN Roster Status to be checked when requesting OR Waivers on an Optioned Player
custom_steps:
MN Roster status is not currently checked when an Optioned Player has OR waivers requested

AC:
 - If an Optioned player has OR waivers requested, the system will perform a check to see if the player is on the Military, Voluntarily Retired, Bereavement, Paternity, Restricted, Suspended, Disqualified, Ineligible, or Temporarily Inactive Lists
 - If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for Clubs and an overrideable warning for BOC:
  -- Text: "Ineligible Waiver Request. <Player Name> is on the <Inactive List status> and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested."
  -- Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
 - Submitting the reinstate from IL transaction will resolve this error (Pending Status is checked)
